医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
全球和地方采取行动对抗肝炎的努力在本次采访中，我们与全球消除肝炎联盟 (CGHE) 副主任 Lindsey Hiebert 和曼德拉·华盛顿研究员兼加纳 Sandema 医院医师助理 James Amugsi 探讨了全球和地方抗击病毒性肝炎的努力。他们共同为抗击肝炎的挑战、成功以及伙伴关系的重要性提供了宝贵的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Global-and-Local-Efforts-to-Take-Action-Against-Hepatitis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Global-and-Local-Efforts-to-Take-Action-Against-Hepatitis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1c85d3b2-60f1-4db6-8cba-4fcaf1456b19 Tue, 20 Aug 2024 10:57:00 -0400 Global and Local Efforts to Take Action Against Hepatitis
诺埃尔·菲茨帕特里克教授解释“什么是一种药物” “单一医学”是一种人类和动物医学​​携手进步的概念，兽医、医生、护士和研究人员齐心协力，确保人类和动物从平等和可持续的医学进步中受益，但不以牺牲动物的生命为代价。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/What-is-One-Medicine-explained-by-P​​rofessor-Noel-Fitzpatrick.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/What-is-One-Medicine-explained-by-P​​rofessor-Noel-Fitzpatrick.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6be64b2e-b22a-4d66-96f5-9740a99c0ba2 Tue, 20 Aug 2024 08:37:00 -0400 'What is One Medicine' explained by Professor Noel Fitzpatrick
持久性有机污染物如何影响肠道健康：代谢破坏和微生物群变化的发现生命早期接触对肠道微生物群有效的 AHR 激动剂及其对晚年代谢健康的潜在影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/How-persistent-organic-pollutants-affect-gut-health-findings-on-metabolic-disruptions-and-microbiota-changes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/How-persistent-organic-pollutants-affect-gut-health-findings-on-metabolic-disruptions-and-microbiota-changes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cb2226ad-f51a-45fe-860b-93a928461166 Tue, 20 Aug 2024 07:59:00 -0400 How persistent organic pollutants affect gut health: findings on metabolic disruptions and microbiota changes
研究表明，工作中的社会心理压力会增加工人患房颤的风险研究人员评估了工作场所心理社会压力因素（例如努力回报失衡和工作压力）对心房颤动发病率的个体和综合影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Psychosocial-stressors-at-work-increase-workers-risk-of-atrial-fibrillation-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Psychosocial-stressors-at-work-increase-workers-risk-of-atrial-fibrillation-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=815cab92-1435-4aaf-a4ff-4cb4d70eecc2 Tue, 20 Aug 2024 06:58:00 -0400 Psychosocial stressors at work increase workers' risk of atrial fibrillation, study suggests
死亡之旅：医疗旅游的最新形式弗朗辛·米兰诺 (Francine Milano) 被诊断出卵巢癌复发，她本以为自己 20 年前已经战胜了卵巢癌，在 18 个月内，她两次从宾夕法尼亚州的家前往佛蒙特州。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Traveling-to-die-The-latest-form-of-medical-tourism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Traveling-to-die-The-latest-form-of-medical-tourism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f715374d-20b8-4f8c-ac24-26feaf841461 Tue, 20 Aug 2024 06:56:14 -0400 Traveling to die: The latest form of medical tourism

独自吃饭如何影响老年瑞典人的膳食习惯研究人员调查了主要独自进餐的瑞典老年人的主观体验和饮食习惯。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/How-eating-alone-shapes-meal-routines-in-elderly-Swedes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/How-eating-alone-shapes-meal-routines-in-elderly-Swedes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4a73b5b-28c5-4a1d-8e46-8772435b6ae0 Tue, 20 Aug 2024 06:39:00 -0400 How eating alone shapes meal routines in elderly Swedes
AI 驱动的 Surreal-GAN 识别不同的大脑衰老模式研究人员利用深度表征学习模型“Surreal-GAN”来检查衰老大脑的异质性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/AI-powered-Surreal-GAN-identizes-diverse-brain-aging-patterns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/AI-powered-Surreal-GAN-identizes-diverse-brain-aging-patterns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ef46bf0-227a-413f-966a-c85fdb94b232 Tue, 20 Aug 2024 06:32:00 -0400 AI-powered Surreal-GAN identifies diverse brain aging patterns

MIND 饮食如何预防痴呆症研究人员利用转录组数据来检查 MIND 饮食在降低痴呆风险和减缓认知能力下降方面的保护作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/How-the-MIND-diet-may-protect-against-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/How-the-MIND-diet-may-protect-against-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4479fbcd-7942-4d18-ae95-ad6845d0bc83 Tue, 20 Aug 2024 06:26:00 -0400 How the MIND diet may protect against dementia
